artist: Artist: Joan Miró; Author: Tristan Tzara; Publisher: Maeght, Paris
description: buff-colored slipcase with abstract line drawings sparsely populating front and back covers and spine; inside slipcase are paper-covered boards with same artwork as on slipcase; loose folded sheets within plain, off-white wrapper containing abstract images drawn in thick lines in bright colors; juxtaposed with text; lender's archive #063
image_copyright: © Joan Mir%C3%B3 and Tristan Tzara %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
inscription: Notation in pencil on frontispiece, LR corner: 1563
medium: Lithographs; letterpress; with collage elements on cover
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed by author and artist in blue ink on colophon page: Tristan Tzara │ Miró -- [underlined]
title: Parler seul (Speaking Alone)
